channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel allowing traders to bring into Gaza ‘dual-use’ items barred from aid organisations
item.description: Sources say generators and tent poles restricted from humanitarian bodies but commercial shipments allowed in Israel is running a parallel system of c...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani sworn in as mayor of New York City
item.description: New mayor, 34, was sworn in by state attorney general Letitia James in old beaux-arts city hall subway station Zohran Mamdani was sworn in as mayor of...

item.title: Hundreds of Blackpool families to be evicted in ‘mass dispersion’ of vulnerable people
item.description: Up to 400 homes face demolition under a £90m regeneration scheme that promises only 230 replacement properties Hundreds of families in one of England’...

item.title: Switzerland resort fire latest news: ‘several dozen’ dead after blast at ski town of Crans-Montana, police say
item.description: About 100 people were injured in the bar early on Thursday morning, but police have ruled out an act of terrorism Officials at the press conference ar...

item.title: Several dozen killed in blast and fire at bar in Swiss ski resort of Crans-Montana
item.description: Police say explosion ripped through a bar where about 100 people were seeing in the new year Switzerland resort explosion – latest updates Several doz...

item.title: Dad pays tribute to 'wonderful family' killed in Boxing Day fire
item.description: Tom Shearman pays tribute to his wife and two children after a fire engulfed their home.

item.title: Annual Channel migrant crossings highest since 2022
item.description: The 2025 total is the highest since 2022, when nearly 46,000 migrants made the crossing.

item.title: Amber snow and ice warnings issued as Arctic air spreads across the UK
item.description: Colder weather with snow and ice warnings in force will continue over the next few days.

item.title: BBC reports from the scene of Swiss resort bar fire
item.description: The BBC's Silvia Costeloe says the bar where the fire broke out has been around for at least 40 years, and is considered an institution in the area.

item.title: Dazzling spectacles in London, Edinburgh and across the UK
item.description: Millions around the UK have attended firework displays and street parties to usher in 2026.
